body_html:
@apaszke They generate errors while linking in MSVC. The error is shown below:

[00:10:58]      Creating library build\temp.win-amd64-3.6\Release\torch/csrc\_C.cp36-win_amd64.lib and object build\temp.win-amd64-3.6\Release\torch/csrc\_C.cp36-win_amd64.exp
[00:10:58]   python_variable_indexing.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "struct _object * THPLongTensorClass" (?THPLongTensorClass@@3PEAU_object@@EA)
[00:10:58]   build\lib.win-amd64-3.6\torch\_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd : fatal error LNK1120: 1 unresolved externals

I think that the decorators are needed, espeically for those exported symbols.

body:
@apaszke They generate errors while linking in MSVC. The error is shown below:
```
[00:10:58]      Creating library build\temp.win-amd64-3.6\Release\torch/csrc\_C.cp36-win_amd64.lib and object build\temp.win-amd64-3.6\Release\torch/csrc\_C.cp36-win_amd64.exp
[00:10:58]   python_variable_indexing.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "struct _object * THPLongTensorClass" (?THPLongTensorClass@@3PEAU_object@@EA)
[00:10:58]   build\lib.win-amd64-3.6\torch\_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd : fatal error LNK1120: 1 unresolved externals
```
I think that the decorators are needed, espeically for those exported symbols.
